Segment.name: LAD
Segment.comment: To transmit detailed lading data pertinent to a pickup or delivery

Field.name: PackagingFormCode
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: UnitWeight
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight per unit

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: LadingDescription

Field.name: LadingValue
Field.comment: Value of shipment for export, expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified
